title: 2 suspects in custody in Lamesa drive-by shooting
content:
LAMESA, TX (KCBD) -
Lamesa Police Chief Dale Alwan says two suspects are now in custody in connection with a drive-by shooting that happened in Lamesa on Monday.
Sources tell KCBD 16 to 18 rounds were fired in the 1600 block of North 8th Street around 7 p.m. Fortunately, no one was hit.
